!--WARNING: DO NOT EDIT ANY OF THE KEYS they are reserved and used within the metaselector api

!--reservedWords.extends: Indicates that this Object extends the specified object.

!--reservedWords.include: Indicates that te specified Object's properties be included in this Object's

!--notes: To specify a regex attribute value, enclose the regex value in regex() e.g one or more digits = regex(\d+?)
The value of 'extends' or 'include' may specify a URL or File. Use # to reference another javascript Object by name
